headline: Cummins Expands Their Power Generation Portfolio With the Addition of State-of-the-Art Zero Emissions 200kWh to 2MWh Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS) Solutions
summary: FRIDLEY, MN / ACCESS Newswire / April 11, 2025 /Cummins Cummins Inc.'s (NYSE:CMI) Power Generation business announced the addition of new Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS) solutions to their global product line. Fully integrated BESS containers ...

headline: Cummins Inc. stock rises Friday, still underperforms market

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid CMI and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Although the S&P 500 is down 9.7% over the past six months, Cummins’s stock price has fallen further to $281.41, losing shareholders 16.3% of their capital. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
